chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z v : dart) (k : nat), (exists i : nat, (i < k)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = v) \/ ~ (exists i : nat, (i < k)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = v)

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Md0.k = zero : dim
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
Module MA0 : Sig Definition f : fmap -> dart -> dart. Definition f_1 : fmap -> dart -> dart. Definition exd_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z <-> exd m (McA0.f m z). Definition exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z <-> exd m (McA0.f_1 m z). Definition bij_f : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McA0.f m). Definition bij_f_1 : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> bij_dart (exd m) (McA0.f_1 m). Definition f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv
MA0.between = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exists i j : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = v /\ Iter (MA0.f m) j z = t /\ (i <= j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA0.exds_orb_eq_ex : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := MA0.Iter_orb m z in let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in exds s t < -> (exists i : nat, (i < p)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t)
MA0.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA0.period_lub : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in (0 < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) nr z = z /\ (forall i : nat, (0 < i < nr)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) i z <> z)
MA0.degree_lub : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.degree m z in (0 < p)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) p z = z /\ (forall i : nat, (0 < i < p)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) i z <> z)
MA0.mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in {j : nat | Iter (MA0.f m) i z = Iter (MA0.f m) j z /\ (j < p)%nat}
MA0.Iter_plus_mult : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f m) p z = z -> Iter (MA0.f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MA0.diff_int = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) => forall i j : nat, (a <= i)%nat /\ (i < j <= b)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) i z <> Iter (MA0.f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope]
cA0_MA0_Iter : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), Iter (cA m zero) i z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MA0.ex_i_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = Iter (MA0.f m) nr z}
MA0.Iter_comp : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), Iter (MA0.f m) (i + j) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i (Iter (MA0.f m) j z)
MA0.degree_diff : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> forall i : nat, (0 < i < MA0.degree m z)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) i z <> z
MA0.Iter_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i n : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MA0.f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MA0.Iter_f_f_1_i : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f_1 m) i (Iter (MA0.f m) i z) = z
MA0.Iter_plus : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f m) (p + i) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z -> Iter (MA0.f m) p z = z
MA0.Iter_plus_inv : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f m) p z = z -> Iter (MA0.f m) (p + i) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MA0.ex_j_exist_j : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat), MA0.ex_j m z t n < -> (exists j : nat, (j <= n)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) j z = t)
MA0.Iter_f_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f m) (S i) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i (MA0.f m z)
MA0.Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (j <= i)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f_1 m) j (Iter (MA0.f m) i z) = Iter (MA0.f m) (i - j) z
MA0.exds_orb_eq_ex_large : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := MA0.Iter_orb m z in let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in exds s t < -> (exists i : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t)
MA0.f_1_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.f_1 m (Iter (MA0.f m) (S i) z) = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MA0.ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem m z in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t}
MA0.exds_orb_ex : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := MA0.Iter_orb m z in let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in exds s t -> {i : nat | (i < p)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t}
MA0.P_degree_diff = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n1 n2 : nat) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (0 < n1)%nat -> forall i : nat, (n1 <= i < n2)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) i z <> z : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope]
MA0.ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t}
MA0.exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := MA0.Iter_orb m z in let n := MA0.Iter_upb m z in (i <= n)%nat -> exds s (Iter (MA0.f m) i z)
MA0.diff_int_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) (t : dart) => forall i : nat, (a <= i <= b)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) i z <> t : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> dart -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope _]
domain_P1 : forall X : R -> Prop, ~ (exists y : R, X y) \/ (exists y : R, X y /\ (forall x : R, X x -> x = y)) \/ (exists x y : R, X x /\ X y /\ x <> y)
MA0.P4 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t} : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Set
MA0.degree_aux_terminate : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n : nat), {v : nat | exists p : nat, forall k : nat, (p < k)%nat -> forall def : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat, Recdef.iter (fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat) k MA0.degree_aux_F def m z n = v}
